Personally I don't like RIPs, but whatever (imho Chaos Legion w/o the movies is missing the point). Bigger question tho... what's your problem with demonoid? It's a legit (lol) torrent site. I've seen shit sites but demonoid definitely isn't. FFS it's one of the largest torrent sites AND it's been around for years, unlike many fly-by-night crap torrent forums that disappear after 3 months. Your chickenshit accusations (you don't even fucking explain WHY it's not "save") make you look stupid because if the site REALLY has problems, do you think it would last this fucking long?! Good god. Use your brains, dude. Either you fucked up the upload procedure, or it got flagged by some dick (how is that the SITE's fault, lol? signups are anon).

Thanks, Subzero! Although, like aensland said, there really is no point to Chaos Legion without the movies. If you guys want to insert the movies yourself after you've finished downloading this torrent, download this torrent: http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/4605881/PC.Chaos.Legion
(You only need to download disk 2, remove the .out at the end of the file). Once you have that downloaded, mount it with DAEMON Tools and open up the MOVIES folder. Drag and drop each movie from the CD2 to your installed version of this torrent and all of the movies will play normally ingame. The torrent that I'm telling you to download for the movies gets an error while trying to play, that's why you need this torrent. Also, if you get an error while trying to play THIS torrent, click the setup.bat file and let it run. That should clear up most questions about this game, hope I helped.
